DVHBIU3428I Changes made to directory entry LINUX2 have been placed online. DVHREQ2289I Your DEDICATE request for LINUX2 at * has completed; with RC = 0. To manually dedicate the same DASD without requiring the virtual machine to log on again, use the following command: ===> ATTACH 1570 TO LINUX2 AS 0705 The ATTACH command is only temporary.
